cards.description: Data on factory, pools, liquidity positions and hooks

cards.title: Uniswap v3 full
cards.description: Data on factory, pools and liquidity positions. Aggregates + RPC data. Outdated arch.

cards.description: Simple squid indexing an NFT exchange on HL.

cards.title: All txs for 1.4M wallets
cards.description: Fetching txs data in bulk, filtering the output.

cards.title: USDC transfers in real time
cards.description: Real-time data on Transfer events from the Ethereum USDC contract.

cards.title: All ERC20 transfers to a single wallet
cards.description: Small squid that fetches ERC20 Transfers to vitalik.eth

cards.title: All events caused by contract calls
cards.description: Fetches all transactions addressed to the AAVE contract plus all event logs emitted.

cards.title: All Mint events
cards.description: Fetches all Mint(address,address,uint256) event logs plus parent txs.

cards.title: Basic DEX pair creation and swaps
cards.description: Simple squid that fetches Swap events emitted by all Pancakeswap pairs.

cards.title: Internal + external calls to a contract
cards.description: Fetches all calls to the BAYC contract, inc ones made by other contracts. Includes parent txs. Also gets all contract state changes.

cards.title: All NFT contract deployments + transfers
cards.description: Gets the data on all contract deployments, inc bytecode. Detects ERC721-compliant contracts. Gets all Transfer events, filters NFT transfers.

cards.description: Indexes Ethereum burns.

cards.description: Indexes Balances.Transfer events on Kusama, ties them to accs.

cards.title: ink! template
cards.description: Indexes an ink! token contract on Shibuya.

cards.description: Saves USDC transfers data to a Google BigQuery dataset.

cards.description: Saves USDC transafers data to CSV files on S3.

cards.description: Saves USDC transafers data to local Apache Parquet files.
